title: European Premiere: Racing Glaciers – VHS
content: With a fan base rapidly expanding with each single they release, Macclesfield quintet Racing Glaciers are one of the most exciting UK bands around at this moment in time. Achieving an almost unprecedented amount of Hype Machine success for a more traditional rock and roll outfit, alongside Radio 1 play for recent singles First Light and Moths, they’re a surefire tip for colossal success in 2015. Newest track, VHS, is another explosive outing, centred around a riff that would see Royal Blood turn green with envy, and their hearts-on-sleeves approach to lyricism; this may well signal the beginning of a more mainstream breakthrough. Check out VHS below and grab a free download from their Music Glue page, plus keep your eyes peeled for their third EP, out 18 August.
